animeTitle: My Organs Awakened and I Suddenly Became Invincible
otherNames: Qiguan Juexing Wo Turan Wudile, My Organs Awakened and I Suddenly Became Invincible, Qìguān Juéxǐng Wǒ Túrán Wúdíle, When My Organs Awakened I Suddenly Became Invincible, 器官觉醒 我突然无敌了
synopsis: After traveling through time, Ye Qing discovered that his organs cultivated themselves under specific conditions, and sometimes even had their own ideas. With the help of these organs that had their own ideas, Ye Qing made rapid progress on the road of cultivation. While others were busy cultivating, comprehending and achieving breakthroughs, his organs had already helped him finish the journey ahead of schedule. However, because his organs were too thoughtful, Ye Qing would encounter some “little” troubles from time to time…
